name: The Floor is Lava!!! Escape from the floor
name_original: The Floor is Lava!!! Escape from the floor
description:
In this game the player needs to get to the plane as fast as possible! The fewer jumps the better for a higher score!

WASD: Control player

Left Shift: Run

Space: Jump

 Gemaakt door

Gemaakt door Sem Jansen 2161409 en Menno Kreukniet 2161708
